description:
Welcome to the Articulate Storyline Training series of video tutorials. In this course you will learn in depth methods and techniques to design and develop e-Learning content using articulate storyline.

With Storyline, you can quickly create effective and engaging courses and presentations that include voice overs, video, animation, and dynamic user interaction using a familiar PowerPoint-style interface.

The visual development environment is user friendly, but like any sophisticated piece of software, it does come with a learning curve.

This training course will provide e-learning developers, instructional designers, in-house trainers and subject matter experts with the knowledge and know-how to design, build and publish their own rapid e-learning programmes using the Articulate Storyline software.

The course has 36 video tutorials and will take approximately five hours to go through it at a stretch.

This course includes demonstrations and examples of building e-Learning content. You will learn to create basic slides, interactive e-Learning modules and simulations. You will also learn to work with videos, images and drag and drop interactions and, you will also learn to create quizzes for assessing your learners.

You should take this course if you want to develop quality e-Learning modules using Articulate Storyline.
title: Learn to create eLearning courses using Articulate Storyline
